clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness and Safety of Firmagon® in Androgen Ablative Therapy of Advanced Hormone-dependent Prostate Carcinoma in Argentina
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness and Safety of Firmagon® in Androgen Ablative Therapy of Advanced Hormone-dependent Prostate Carcinoma in Argentina

oversight_info.authority: Argentina: Administracion Nacional de Medicamentos, Alimentos y Tecnologia Medica

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective, observational study to collect and analyze data on patients with advanced hormone dependent prostate cancer treated with Firmagon® according to routine medical practice in Argentina

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.measure: Progression-free survival (PFS) failure rate (with failure defined as either prostate-specific antigen (PSA) failure, introduction of additional therapy related to prostate cancer, or death)
primary_outcome.description: The PFS failure rate will be estimated with time to PFS failure as dependent and adjusting for disease stage at baseline, baseline PSA, baseline testosterone (if available) and baseline serum Alkaline Phosphatase (s-ALP, if available)

arm_group.description: Advanced Prostate Cancer that receive Firmagon therapy in the context of usual clinical practice

study_pop.textblock: 200 patients with Advanced Prostate Cancer that receive Firmagon therapy in the context of usual clinical practice

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Advanced Prostate Cancer patients to be treated with Firmagon in the context of usual clinical practice
- Written informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Contraindications to Firmagon
- Patients already on Firmagon therapy
